import Label from "components/Label/Label"; import NcInputNumber from "components/NcInputNumber"; import Prices from "components/Prices"; import { Product, PRODUCTS } from "data/data"; import { useState } from "react"; import { Helmet } from "react-helmet-async"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import ButtonPrimary from "shared/Button/ButtonPrimary"; import Input from "shared/Input/Input"; import ContactInfo from "./ContactInfo"; import PaymentMethod from "./PaymentMethod"; import ShippingAddress from "./ShippingAddress"; const CheckoutPage = () => { const [tabActive, setTabActive] = useState< "ContactInfo" | "ShippingAddress" | "PaymentMethod" >("ShippingAddress"); const handleScrollToEl = (id: string) => { const element = document.getElementById(id); setTimeout(() => { element?.scrollIntoView({ behavior: "smooth" }); }, 80); }; const renderProduct = (item: Product, index: number) => { const { image, price, name } = item; return (
